info.name: mHouseInterior
info.welcomeMessage1: We're delighted to have you here. At MHouseInterior, we believe that your home should reflect your personality and style. Whether you're looking to revamp your living space, create a cozy bedroom retreat, or design a functional yet stylish kitchen, we're here to help make your interior design dreams come true.
info.welcomeMessage2: Browse through our collections, get inspired by our design ideas, and let our team of experts guide you in transforming your house into a home. Feel free to reach out with any questions or to schedule a consultation.
info.intro: Welcome to the MHouseInterior family! Let's create something beautiful together.

profile.name: Mukesh Lohar
profile.description1: As a founder, I am thrilled to share my passion for interior design with you. With over 5 years of experience in the industry and more than 30 successfully completed projects, I have dedicated my career to transforming spaces into beautiful, functional environments that truly inspire and elevate the lives of my clients.
profile.description2: At mHouseInterior, I believe that every space has its own story, and it's my mission to bring that story to life through thoughtful and personalized design solutions. I take the time to understand each client's unique needs and tastes, blending aesthetics with functionality to create interiors that not only look stunning but also serve a practical purpose.
